name: Doors To Success
description:
Made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #10 - Haunted Melody.

Unemployment is a touchy subject. This game already sparked some very interesting and insightful conversations amongst us and our friends, when it wasn't even done yet. And now it's out there for everyone. We appreciate you all, your experiences, goals, dreams, fears. Know that you are not alone - and join the conversation, share your thoughts!

Also: we LOVE bug reports and suggestions, please don't hold back <3
If you don't want to write them in the public chat, e-mail me at: storyteller@h91.dergeier.com

Credits:

code: Alias
art & writing: Styxcolor https://styxcolor.itch.io/
music: Fidel Delgado https://fideldelgado.itch.io/
